message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM

The paper proposes an audiovisual system for speech activity detection using deep learning, which involves computer vision (visual information) and natural language processing (speech processing). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.SD (Sound), which deals with audio and speech processing. The paper also uses deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper investigates an end-to-end training approach, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper uses a large audiovisual corpus, which is related to multimedia (cs.MM).
